org.gvsig.xmlschema.som
Interface IXSSchemaDocument

All Known Implementing Classes:
GPEXmlSchemaDocument, XSSchemaDocumentImpl
public interface IXSSchemaDocument

This interface represents a XML file. It could has some associated schemas.

Author:
Jorge Piera LLodrá (jorge.piera@iver.es)
